role_dependencies: Ensures Snap is installed on Linux systems
role_description: An Ansible role that installs IntelliJ on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: [IntelliJ IDEA](https://www.jetbrains.com/idea/) is an integrated development environment written in Java for developing computer software. It is developed by JetBrains, and is available as an Apache 2 Licensed community edition, and in a proprietary commercial edition. Both can be used for commercial development.
